email_chain.subject: Inquiry: CFR Rotterdam to Santos - 12,000MT Steel Coils
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 12,000MT of steel coils from Rotterdam to Santos under CFR terms. Could you provide a freight quote and vessel availability for a laycan of October 10-15?

Best regards,
James Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Rotterdam to Santos - 12,000MT Steel Coils
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN TRADER, currently in Antwerp, for your shipment. The initial freight quote is USD 65 per metric tonne. The vessel has a DWT of 45,000 and an LOA of 180m. Laycan can be adjusted to October 12-17 if needed.

Let me know your thoughts.
Best,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Rotterdam to Santos - 12,000MT Steel Coils
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of USD 65 seems a bit high compared to current market levels. Could you consider revising it to USD 60? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Rotterdam to Santos - 12,000MT Steel Coils
email_chain.body:
James,

I understand your concern. We can adjust the rate to USD 62 per metric tonne, which is our best offer given the current market. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Rotterdam to Santos - 12,000MT Steel Coils
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

USD 62 works for us. Please proceed with the booking for the laycan of October 12-17. Kindly send the charter party agreement at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Rotterdam to Santos - 12,000MT Steel Coils
email_chain.body:
James,

Great! I will prepare the charter party agreement and send it over within the next hour. Thank you for your business.

Best,
Sophia
